title: Minister Lamamra receives the Kenyan National Assembly Speaker
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, received Wednesday at the headquarters of the Ministry, the Kenyan National Assembly Speaker, Moses Wetangula, who is paying an official visit to Algeria at the head of a large parliamentary delegation.

The meeting allowed both parties to highlight the ties of brotherhood and cooperation between the two brotherly countries and peoples and review the prospects for strengthening them in various areas and ways to deepen political coordination in light of current regional and international developments.

The two sides welcomed the parliamentary cooperation between the two countries and their privileged historical relations, expressing the willingness of the two countries to build a mutually beneficial strategic partnership to strengthen their contribution to the realization of the Continental Agenda, to mobilize support to the fair and just causes, including the decolonization of Western Sahara, and to combine efforts to find African solutions to African problems.
